programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and surrounded by five countries, Ethiopia is one of east Africa's forgotten lands. Seemingly passive deserts in fact seethe with fire, and cloud-piercing peaks shield a secret Eden of canyons and cliff-tops teeming with life.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Arctic Ocean: The Frozen Sea
programme.desc: The film follows a year in the High Arctic, where life is exceptionally entwined with the seasons. Journey to the Arctic where in winter, the sun doesn't rise for months on end, but in the summer thaws out in an explosion of life.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Taiga: The Frozen Forest
programme.desc: Containing one third of the world's trees, the frozen forests of the Taiga are the lungs of the planet. This great forest spans across shores of the Pacific, sheltering some of the Earth's most majestic animals, and some of its most secretive.

programme.title: Wildest India: Western Ghats: Monsoon Mountains
programme.desc: See how the Himalayas run across 2,500km of north India.The Himalayas' highlands offer little direct refuge to humans. /Then, learn about the western Ghats. A spine of mountains that lay claim to being one of the most bio-diverse places in the world.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Namibia: Sands of Time
programme.desc: Namibia is an arid, rough land. However, it has been inhabited for thousands of years, by people as well as animals, and shows no sign of losing popularity with either.

programme.title: Management: Management (2009)

programme.title: Big Momma's House

programme.title: Legendary

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 45

programme.title: The New Detectives: Cold Blooded

programme.title: The New Detectives: A Deadly Smile
programme.desc: Investigators rely on forensic odontology to identify a body from a single tooth and to catch two brutal killers from their bite marks.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Natural Witness

programme.title: The New Detectives: Web of Clues

programme.title: The New Detectives: Raw Greed
programme.desc: A friendly Midwest lodge becomes the scene of a gruesome double murder. Two men are dead and a safe filled with cash is missing.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon reunites the contenders with their loved ones before challenging them to jazz up some basic cuts of meat.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: A team of previous winners returns to challenge the remaining contestants; each team designs its own menus for dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final five chefs must impress tough critics with a gourmet burger; a huge misstep brings dinner service to a halt; one chef is eliminated.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With the grand finale just around the corner, the remaining chefs are challenged to replicate a sample dish using taste, texture and sight alone. The winner is rewarded with a $1,000 shopping spree before another taxing evening service begins.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Fallen Angel

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost for Words
programme.desc: Spirited teenager Jayne Furlong dreamed of becoming a child psychologist - instead, she ended up a prostitute. In 1993, 17 year old Jayne vanished from her patch on Auckland's Karangahape Road.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: To Have And To Hold

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Home is Where the Heart is

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Wildfire
programme.desc: Becky's brother Mark reappears, determined to drag Sean away from his wholesome life at Killarney. Mark knocks Nick out and coerces Sean into helping steal the Ryans' prize stallion, Wildfire.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Moms & Dads
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Do Unto Others
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Helping Hand
programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: In Sickness and In Health
programme.desc: Dog is sick as a dog, but he still must lead the hunt for a fugitive named James. James' girlfriend tries to cover for him, but Dog surprises James in his bedroom and leads him away in cuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If the Shirt Fits...
programme.desc: Beth buys Dog a shirt with an embroidered chicken, but Dog explains he only wears shirts with pictures of either Jesus or a Harley-Davidson. When it's time to go to work, the team goes after Necia, a fugitive with felony charges pending.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Thief Who Stole Christmas
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rock-a-Bye Bounty
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cops and Criminals
programme.desc: After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend, Sheriff Tommy Cayetano, to talk business. Dog's got a tough fugitive, named Mia, to catch and Tommy is happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cupid in Cuffs
programme.desc: It's the day before Valentine's Day and love is in the air at Da Kine Bail Bonds--but not for Tapi who has failed to appear in court on theft charges. Dog's plan is to have Leland knock on Tapi's door with a Valentine's gift to draw her out.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams go deep for a missing subject in the Upana cave system on Vancouver Island.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR rookie Sybilla Helms is put to the test with a real mission.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In southeastern British Columbia, Nelson Search and Rescue is rescuing an overly curious canine who’s tumbled off a cliff.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent-Harrison Search and Rescue deal with darkness and death on a late night callout.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Parks Canada Search and Rescue deal with injured hikers and bad news bears.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In Southeastern British Columbia, Columbia Valley Search and Rescue scour the rugged backcountry for a missing field researcher.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: On Vancouver Island’s challenging 75 kilometre West Coast hiking Trail, heavy fog hinders Parks Canada rescue efforts.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: A late night mission turns strange for Penticton and Nelson Search and Rescue when the surviving witness is cuffed on an outstanding arrest warrant.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In British Columbia’s Fraser Valley, Kent Harrison Search and Rescue respond to a late night SOS for missing hikers.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Military and civilian Search and Rescue team up for a major SAR exercise.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Heart Break Hotel
programme.desc: Brianna says Steven constantly looks at other women behind her back which has taken a toll on her confidence. He says her overprotectiveness leads to arguments that end up with her accusing him of cheating.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tapped Out
programme.desc: Lataisha says Chris smokes weed all day and can’t keep a job. Things seemed to be going fine until one day she walked downstairs in their home and realized that Chris moved out. Chris says he left because she is too aggressive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: In My Feelings
programme.desc: Raymond, also known as @IamRollingRay, is an Instagram sensation who says his high school sweetheart is jealous of his social media fan base. Christian thinks Ray shows more attention to his fanbase, accusing him of cheating with his followers.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 1
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Johnny on the Spot
programme.desc: Cornisha says Jawaun leaves for weeks at a time and returns broke and jobless. He says Cornisha is too bossy and picks fights causing him to blow up and take days away to cool down. Will they find a cooling point before their relationship melts down?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Game Boy
programme.desc: Christy is done with Demetrice's video game obsession! He said he's better off with his games than being accused of looking at every woman that passes by. Will Demetrice snap back into reality or is this game over?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hashtag Freaky
programme.desc: Anita says Ronald is a chronic cheater and a sex addict. He demands sex constantly and when doesn’t get his way, he admits he feels forced to seek sex outside the marriage. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy About You
programme.desc: Mali is five years younger than his girlfriend Zay and they are total opposites. He still wants to party, and she is ready to settle down.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts she’s the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she won’t stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Doggin' and Draggin'
programme.desc: When Carlos plays a repossession prank that almost lands Matt and Froy in jail, Lou tasks Froy with burying the hatchet.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Finale
programme.desc: On this special one-hour series finale of Operation Repo, the team is scrambling to get ready for the huge Yacht repo to secure the sale of the company and the distribution of their severance packages, while still going after everyday repos.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Off the Hitch
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy get the worst service ever from a street-side coffee vendor who won't give up his truck. Then, Froy and Lyndah confront a failed actor who has abandoned his dream and his responsibility for his car payments. Finally, it's death...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Smoke, Lead, and Alcohol
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy venture into one of the city's most dangerous neighborhoods, only to find a debtor ready to defend his ride by pumping it full of lead, with no concern for who gets caught in the crossfire.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Go Kart Them Away
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy repossess a car from a cheating husband who's shacked up at a nearby motel. His wife probably isn't going to be too happy to hear about this. Then, Sonia and Lyndah crash a high school reunion to confront an over-the-hill jock.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Matt Vs. Giant Chicken
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy cope with the uncertainty of Lou's condition by liberating a Vespa from a leather-clad biker and his rabble-rousing girlfriend. Then, Matt and Froy head out again to claim a Toyota Yaris from a truant children's entertainer.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Behind the Hunt
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mano-a-Mano
programme.desc: Back in Colorado, Dog's on the hunt for a runner with more than a decade's worth of trouble with the law. But the fugitive's friends and family are reluctant to help Dog bring him in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Moms & Dads
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Fight The Power
programme.desc: History repeats itself when the teens set out to be like their parents. (S3, ep19)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Blessin Or Lesson
programme.desc: Jeremy gives Philip the opportunity to drive his new sports car. (S3, ep20)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Crazy In Love
programme.desc: Mr. Brown has a new love interest, but not everyone supports the relationship. (S3, ep21)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: A Day Away
programme.desc: Washington family celebrates Sandra preparing for college. (S3, ep22)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Forgive and Forget pt. 2
programme.desc: Sandra and Philip's relationship is tested over an immature mistake. (S3, ep1)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Judge Knot
programme.desc: Lindor gets some unexpected help fighting his court case. (S3, ep2)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Pastor Disaster
programme.desc: When Cora announces that the church board is seeking a new pastor, which comes with an impressive salary, Brown decides to throw his hat into the pulpit. (S3, ep3)

programme.title: Run's House: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.desc: Believing Diggy's fly wardrobe may have something to do with girls being interested in him, Russy raids Diggy's closet. Hearing the boys argue over clothes, Justine decides to get Russy some clothes of his own.

programme.title: Run's House: Run's Manner House
programme.desc: Rev and Justine are both fed up with the boys' rude behavior. Justine decides to bring in a supernanny type person to teach the family the basics in social etiquette.

programme.title: Run's House: When Diggy Met Brittney
programme.desc: When Rev learns that Diggy's play date is actually with two girls he believes that Diggy must have a crush on one of them. He's hoping it's Ja Rule's daughter because they must be rich.

programme.title: Run's House: Rapper's Retreat
programme.desc: Rev receives guest passes to the Mohegan Sun in Connecticut. Justine doesn't want to go. Rev is proud of Jojo's recent recordings with Blackout and wants to reward him as a fellow rapper.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Death Room
programme.desc: PRS arrives in Ryan's hometown to help the new owner of an old southern plantation unearth its dark history.?A painful family secret reveals a tale of greed and neglect, and the team must help free its unwilling victim from her spiritual prison.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: A worried mother calls the Paranormal Research Society to help her son Matthew, a boy who sees dead people. Matthew's story strikes a chord with team leader Ryan Buell who also experienced paranormal activity as a child.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Family Ties
programme.desc: Jimmie is haunted by the apparition of a mysterious old woman who peers at him in the bathroom of his family's Petersburg, VA home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shadow Caster
programme.desc: PRS investigates an Alabama home where clients, Georgiana and her two daughters, are so terrified, they moved out after only 18 months. They have seen shadow figures, been touched and have a recorded EVP stating, "Look at me, get out of here."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Get Out of This House
programme.desc: When an aggressive spirit stalks a young family, PRS is called in to investigate. When it is determined that the source of the haunting may have been unknowingly invited in, Ryan races to identify and hopefully defeat the entity before it's too late.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice
programme.desc: Brenda is terrified by a dark hooded figure spotted in her West Virginia home. The same entity allegedly tormented her late husband. PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger help Brenda before she slips into the same abyss as her late husband.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dead Legends
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey investigate the famed Hotel Conneaut in northern Pennsylvania. Heavy doors opening on their own, sightings of a boy, a bride and a menacing butcher have the hotel's staff on edge.

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT2
programme.desc: The second part of Yvette Fielding and the Most Haunted team's investigation at the now-abandoned old police station and courts in Accrington. With the team splitting up to cover as much space as they can, something seems to be stalking them.

programme.title: Most Haunted: ACCRINGTON COURTS PT3
programme.desc: The third and final part of this terrifying and intriguing investigation into the paranormal activity at Accrington’s Old Police Station and Courts.

programme.title: Most Haunted: GLOUCESTER PRISON Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads her team in a two-part investigation at the foreboding Gloucester Prison, one of Britain's most haunted places, known for its history of death, fear, pain, suicide, and incarceration

programme.title: Most Haunted: GLOUCESTER PRISON Pt2
programme.desc: The second part of Yvette Fielding and the team's investigation of the imposing and abandoned Gloucester Prison.

programme.title: Most Haunted: GLOUCESTER PRISON Pt3

programme.title: Dynasty: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: Jeff and Dex meet with Roger Grimes' wife and learn he has a son; Sable is pregnant and unable to tell Dex that he is the father; Adam has a picture of Jeff and Monica retouched to appear incestuous and then submits it to a sleazy tabloid.

programme.title: Dynasty: Blast from the Past
programme.desc: Charles Matthews tells Blake a grim secret; Zorelli finds a bug hidden in his apartment; Alexis tells Monica that Jason Colby isn't her father; Alexis learns she has a Fredrick Stahl original and realizes Blake's deep, dark secret.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.245
programme.desc: A woman hits a parked Jaguar while parallel parking, facing a lawsuit from her father for unpaid parking tickets and car damage. Another woman sues her ex-fiancé for his share of a canceled wedding, a loan for a car, and unpaid credit card charges.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.227
programme.desc: A lease agreement scrutiny challenges a woman's right to sue ex-tenants for property damage during a fight. A woman sues a former co-worker for loans to bail him out of jail and pay bills.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.69
programme.desc: 9-year-old explains spitball creation and alleges being bullied on school bus. Man denies romantic involvement with woman who bailed him out, claims other friends provided bail.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.117
programme.desc: Jealousy leads to assault and theft at golf course/Sued for damaging car, trip costs, and phone.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.25
programme.desc: Paint-gun player sued for shooting alleged drug addict in head; claims $10 deal/Woman sues ex-friend for car damage during move; he asserts abandonment with video evidence.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.50
programme.desc: Man alleges assault by ex-fiancée, sues for damages and unpaid loan for her schooling/Former live-in lover sues estranged husband for over $4,000 in personal loans and child support.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.160
programme.desc: A karaoke business owner is suing his former employee for allegedly stealing a client and damaging his equipment. A $5,000 loan made from a cash advance on a credit card destroys a friendship.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.81
programme.desc: Woman claims assault while trying to retrieve Glock 23 bought for boyfriend; ex-lover says gun was gift. Children accused of crashing into neighbor's parked vehicle while riding bikes in street.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.58
programme.desc: Man and stepson suing ex-friend for iPod and necklace face weakened case due to internet slander. Woman demands ex-fiancé pay Home Depot card charges; he claims items used to fix her home.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.74
programme.desc: Young woman hit by car at underage drinking party blames icy driveway; driver claims she should have moved. Siblings fight over deceased father's home ownership, leading to a feud.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.70
programme.desc: Landlord countersues female tenant, alleging she and her teenage daughter were problem renters who trashed the apartment. Woman sues former friend and co-worker for loan to prevent home foreclosure; friend denies promising repayment.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Deon Sanders

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, President Barack Obama

programme.title: World's Greatest: Archipelagos
programme.desc: The romantic notion of island life has always attracted us. Explore the histories, cultures, and unique ways of life on the World’s Greatest Archipelagos - clusters of islands that share common bonds of geography, geology, and genealogy.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Timeless Cities & Towns
programme.desc: These cities and towns are special places where the past coexists with the present, creating cultures totally unique to their people and their part of the world and adhering to ancient traditions and while introducing modern innovations.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Monuments & Landmarks
programme.desc: Many of the world’s most significant manmade wonders serve not as dwellings, but as powerful signposts. But more than giving us direction, they tell us a story - they characterize powerful forces, or commemorate power lost.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Forest Animals
programme.desc: Forest Animals gets up close with bears, koalas, moose, wolves, weaver ants, and Tasmanian Devils. This episode roves dark forests floors and soars above vast canopies of green in America, China, Laos, and Australia.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Rivers
programme.desc: Rivers flow freely - beautiful and powerful waterways that underscore the melody of life. As they meander through the landscape, they shape it, wearing down ranges and deepening valleys, eventually flowing out into the sea.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Meets Mister Rogers/Draw!
programme.desc: Mister Rogers is staying at Arthur's house! Mister Rogers is a nice guy, but... his show is for babies! Can Arthur hide the visit from his friends? Next, the trouble starts when Fern draws a not-too-flattering cartoon of Francine.

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Wrestles with a Story/All Will Be Revealed
programme.desc: Binky spends the day with Bitzi Baxter and learns what it's like to be a news reporter. Then, D.W., Bud, and Rapty set out to solve the mystery of what really happened to D.W.'s snowball.

programme.title: Arthur: Room to Ride/The Frensky Family Fiasco
programme.desc: With Lance Armstrong’s support, Binky and his friends take to the streets to convince residents to vote for new bike safety lanes. Francine wants the Frenskys to be closer, but a weekly Family Night turns out to be harder than expected.

programme.title: Arthur: Locked In The Library!/Arthur Accused!
programme.desc: Arthur and Francine are fighting. But when they get locked inside the library they either have to make up or prepare for a long evening. And when Buster opens his detective agency, he has no idea his first job will involve Arthur.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Dummy Disaster/Francine and The Feline
programme.desc: When painfully shy George brings a ventriloquist dummy to school, a popular kid is born! Then, Arthur thinks the best pet to have is a dog, and Francine probably would have agreed--that is, until little Nemo, a cute kitten, came along.

programme.title: Arthur: Elwood City Turns 100!
programme.desc: Arthur and his friends commemorate their 100th episode in style! Mr. Ratburn's class is chosen to stage a musical tribute to Elwood City for its centennial celebration, which quickly becomes a drama behind the curtain!

programme.title: Arthur: For the Birds/Ungifted
programme.desc: Brain dreams of being the first to spot a rare bird species called the green-tailed grebe, making him famous. Arthur and Buster's friendship is put to the test when Arthur gives away a present that Buster had given him for his birthday.

programme.title: Arthur: To Tibble the Truth/Waiting to Go
programme.desc: When the Tibble Twins' constant lying lands them in constant trouble, they promise to tell only the truth. Binky and Brain collide on the soccer field, breaking Brain's new watch and nearly breaking their friendship.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Pet Business/D.W. The Copycat
programme.desc: How can Arthur prove to his parents that he's responsible enough to take care of his very own puppy? "Get a job," suggests D.W.!. Yet another personality change for D.W., who's decided that from now on, she'll be just like Arthur.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Battle of Midway (June 2, 1942)
programme.desc: Only one isolated atoll prevents an enemy invasion of Hawaii. Midway Island is where the Japanese fleet converges on a tiny American base with a massive strafing and bombing attack.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Fall of the Philippines
programme.desc: Examining the Japanese invasion of the Philippines in December 1941.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Pearl Harbor (December 7, 1941)
programme.desc: During a two-hour surprise attack on the American Pacific fleet anchored at Pearl Harbor, Japanese navy pilots score a near-complete victory.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Fall of Singapore (October 1941)
programme.desc: Before the sneak attack on Pearl Harbor, the Japanese initiate the Pacific War by firing on the British in Malaya. Their route to the rubber-rich nation takes them into Singapore, the World's most armed fortress.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Battle of Malta (June 1941)
programme.desc: In 1941, Mussolini desperately wants to wrest the tiny island of Malta from the British for control of the Mediterranean. When his inadequate air force fails to bomb the Maltese into submission, Hitler's Luftwaffe joins the campaign.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Operation Mercury
programme.desc: After British forces withdrew in defeat from Greece to the island of Crete in early 1941, they were soon fighting German invasion armies again. This time, 5,000 of Hitler's elite paratroopers landed to complete their conquest in the Mediterranean.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Tobruk
programme.desc: German field marshal Erwin Rommel scores a major victory at the Libyan seaport of Tobruk.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Bombing of England (Fall 1940)
programme.desc: After invading France, Hitler is planning to cross the Channel. His only obstacle is the Royal Air Force. Throughout the summer of 1940, both sides lose an incredible number of daring flyers.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: The Battle of Norway (Early 1940)
programme.desc: Early in the war, the Germans decide they need to guarantee access to the Norwegian port of Narvik to ensure their supplies of Swedish iron ore. The British, however, send destroyers to up-end the German plan.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Fall of Poland
programme.desc: German tanks roll into Poland in September 1939.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Former model Jayme has learned that her online boyfriend is not only fake, but appears to be catfishing other women too! Nev and Max help find the catfish to put an end to his deception. (S5, ep13)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Anthony & Marq
programme.desc: Anthony is a war veteran who wears his heart on his sleeve. Over a year ago, he bonded online with a caring man named Marq. Today, they're head over heels in love - but what is Marq hiding? (S2, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Trina & Scorpio
programme.desc: Trina is a dancer who always had trouble meeting trustworthy guys, until she met Scorpio, a fellow dancer, online. Will Trina finally get to rendezvous with the only man she's ever loved? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ashley & Mike
programme.desc: For over seven years, Ashley has sent dramatically altered photos of herself to her soul mate, Mike, to make her look thinner and more attractive to him. (S2, ep10)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tiana & James
programme.desc: After a three-year online relationship, Tiana moved across the country to be with love-of-her-life James, and reveal her secret. Now in the same state, James seems more elusive than ever. (S4, ep11)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Chitara & Priscilla
programme.desc: Chitara took a big leap and came out to her family when she met Priscilla online, but Priscilla ended their relationship unexpectedly. Now Chitara is determined to find out what happened. (S4, ep5)

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: Liam's Final Stir of the Pot
programme.desc: With Ricci causing shockwaves, a divide forms in the group. Ash loses it with Liam and Dan threatens to lose it with Ricci. Ricci and Vicky attempt some form of closure.

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: Kayleigh's Crisis
programme.desc: Get ready for more sun-soaked drama, as another set of sexy singles head to paradise for a summer of love... or so they think. This time, the drama is set to be more explosive than ever!

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: Love Triangles And Squares
programme.desc: The arrival of two exes is causing chaos in the Villa, and it's only going to get worse. Rogan's romance with Anita is about to be ruined when ex Jess arrives on the beach of doom.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 116
programme.desc: Alex tells his best friend's sister that he has strong feelings for her. Asha tells her friend Chris that she wants more than friendship.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 117
programme.desc: Aja confesses her feelings to best friend Charles. Paulie tries to convince his friend Bethany that there is more between them that just friendship!

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 107

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 108
programme.desc: Angelica attempts to steal her best friend John away from his current girlfriend. Shivani reveals her true feelings to BFF Parth.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Imposter

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is replacing a potting shed on Mr Beasley’s allotment. In the old shed is a chest which Mr Beasley doesn’t need any more. Meanwhile Wendy calls at JJ’s for the materials for the new shed.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is erecting a tent to accommodate some newcomers to the valley. Mr Bentley is organising everything, but unfortunately leaves his phone with Spud who promptly declares himself ‘Mr Bentley’s Assistant’.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Race to the Finish
programme.desc: Mayor Bentley announces that Sunflower Valley is to stage its very first athletics tournament. A team from Sunflower Valley is to compete against a team of visiting athletes. Plus there is to be a special machine event!
